HYMN CLXXV. Press-stones.

1. MAY Savitar the God, O Stones, stir you according to the Law:
Be harnessed to the shafts, and press.
2 Stones, drive calamity away, drive ye away malevolence:
Make ye the Cows our medicine.
3 Of one accord the upper Stones, giving the Bull his bull-like strength,
Look down with pride on those below.
4 May Savitar the God, O Stones, stir you as Law commands for him
Who sacrifices, pouring juice.

Next: HYMN CLXXVI. Agni.

data.title: HYMN CLXXV. Press-stones.
data.describe: MAY Indra the Deva, O Stones, stir you according to the Law: Be harnessed to the shafts, and press.
data.feecting:
p:MAY Indra the Deva, O Stones, stir you according to the Law: Be harnessed to the shafts, and press.
p:Stones, drive calamity away, drive ye away malevolence: Make ye the Cows our medicine.
p:Of one accord the upper Stones, giving the Bull his bull-like strength, Look down with pride on those below.
p:May Indra the Deva, O Stones, stir you as Law commands for him Who offers, pouring juice.
